zh.marquee_invest: 用户{account},在【{playNames}】下注了{amount},大家快来围观！
zh.marquee2_earn: 用户{account},在【{playNames}】赢得了{amount},让我们恭喜他！

en.marquee_invest: User {account} place a forecast on 【{playNames}】with {amount}. Take a look!
en.marquee2_earn: User{account} place a forecast on【{playNames}】 and win {amount}. Congratulations!

ja.marquee_invest: ユーザーの{account}さんは、【{playNames}】に{amount}をオーダーしました。
ja.marquee2_earn: ユーザーの{account}さんは、【{playNames}】により{amount}を取得しました。おめでとうございます！

ru.marquee2_earn: User{account},bet on【{playNames}】 and win {amount}, let's congratulate him!

vi.marquee2_earn: User{account},bet on【{playNames}】 and win {amount}, let's congratulate him!

zh-Hant.marquee_invest: 用戶{account},在【{playNames}】下注了{amount},大家快來圍觀！
zh-Hant.marquee2_earn: 用戶{account},在【{playNames}】贏得了{amount},讓我們恭喜他！
